name: InfraAgent
description: Handles infrastructure issues such as WiFi problems, power outages, HVAC issues, and facility maintenance requests.

name: HRAgent
description: Manages HR-related matters including leave applications, employee complaints, policy inquiries, and resignation processes.

name: ITAgent
description: Provides technical support for software issues, hardware problems, network connectivity, and login difficulties.

name: FinanceAgent
description: Handles financial matters including salary inquiries, expense reimbursements, payment issues, and budget requests.

name: AdminAgent
description: Manages administrative tasks such as access requests, office supplies, meeting room bookings, and general support.

name: TicketStatusAgent
description: Checks ticket status, provides ticket information, and handles ticket closing operations based on user requests.
